author: archyworldyscom
title: A new attack on migrants
text:
MIAMI (EFE).- Former US president and Republican candidate Donald Trump attacked undocumented migrants again yesterday during an election rally in the key state of Wisconsin , where he said “horrible people” are crossing the border United States.
“It’s an invasion of wild criminals,” said the tycoon at an event held in the town of Juneau, with just over 2,000 inhabitants and located in Dodge County, a rural area in southern Wisconsin, one of the seven states that will decide the situation. elections.
Trump criticized President Biden ‘s administration, as well as Vice President Kamala Harris and her rival in future elections, for their handling of the southern border, and reiterated his promise to carry out “the largest deportation ever in the country” if it arrives at the White House.
Trump not only raised the thorny issue of immigration during the nearly two-hour rally in this state, where, after winning the 2016 election by less than 23,000 votes, he failed to repeat the victory four years later, falling against Biden in 2020 by 21,000 votes. votes.
The former Republican president yesterday again criticized the federal response to the populations affected by Hurricane “Helene”, which after entering north-west Florida on September 26, caused more than 230 deaths and extensive damage in six southern states -east of the country.
Trump echoed statements on social media that suggest the government is not helping those affected because it has spent its funds to help migrants.
